Most Illustrious Sir

Piratini, September 4, 1838.

The Government, having finally established a newspaper with the purpose of guiding the brave people of Rio Grande regarding the progress of affairs concerning them, by inserting the proceedings of the Secretariats of State and official correspondence with the Generals, Commanders of the Republican Army Forces, and Police, and being unable, given the repeated needs of the army, to distribute the said newspaper for free, commits to Your Lordship

The names of the subscribers will be sent to Luís Rossetti, editor of said newspaper.

God keep Your Lordship,

Domingos José de Almeida

Official letter from the Most Excellent, September 4, received on the 10th of the same month, regarding the periodical.
